careerBackground: I have a Master’s degree in HR Management and Development from NYU and a second Master’s in Management Consultancy from the Smurfit Business School. I have worked in recruitment for about five years, gaining experience at various companies in New York City.
role: My role at ANDigital is Talent Scout which means I am responsible for sourcing and selecting new talent to join the ANDigital team. Selecting the right people is top priority in the ANDigital plan for success.
superHeroPower: My Superhero power would be the ability to Freeze things so I would have more time to think about the best way to deal with situations.
